chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> expf (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x)) z t <-> expf m z t

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set
inv_hmap_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> inv_hmap (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))
eqc_eqc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) x (A m k x) -> eqc m z t -> eqc (B m k x) z t
eqco = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart) => eqc (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x)) z t : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
eqc_B_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) z t -> eqc m z t
expfo_expf : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> expfo m x z t < -> expf m z t
expfo = fun (m : fmap) (x z t : dart) => expf (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) z t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exd_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in exd (L (B m k x) k x y) z < -> exd m z
expf_I : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart) (u : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> expf (I m x u p) z t < -> expf m z t
expf_B0_CS_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> expf m xb0 z /\ expf m x0 t \/ expf m xb0 t /\ expf m x0 z \/ expf m z t -> expf (B m zero x) z t
eqc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m z t < -> eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t
nv_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nv m1 = nv m
ne_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in ne m1 = ne m
ndZ_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nd m1 = nd m
Iter_cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in Iter (cF (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
expf_L1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> expf m1 z t < -> expf m z t
cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cF (L (B m k x) k x y) z = cF m z
F_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in F (L (B m k x) k x y) z = F m z
expf_B0_CS_1_c : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t -> expf (B m zero x) z t
A_not_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A m k x <> cA (B m k x) k x
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
A_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A m j z
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
cA_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA_1 m j z
A_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A_1 m j z
eqc_B_CS : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t -> eqc m z t
eqc_B_CN : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m z t -> eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t
expf_L1_I_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in ~ expf m x y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0
expf_L1_I_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_B0_CS_1_a_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CS_1_a : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_L1_CNS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m one x y) z t < -> (let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in if expf_dec m x y0 then betweenf m x z y0 /\ betweenf m x t y0 \/ betweenf m y_1 z x10 /\ betweenf m y_1 t x10 \/ ~ expf m x z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0)
nc_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nc m1 = nc m
expf_B0_CS_2_a_I : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> expf m x_1 z -> expf m x_1 t -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CS_2_a_III : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> expf m xh0_1 z -> expf m x_1 t -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CS_2_a_IV : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> expf m x_1 z -> expf m xh0_1 t -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CS_2_a_II : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> expf m xh0_1 z -> expf m xh0_1 t -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CS_2_b : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> expf m z t -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m xh0_1 z -> expf (B m zero x) z t
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
expf_B0_CS_1_b_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m xh0_1 t x0 -> expf (B m zero x) z t
A_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A_1 (B m k x) k (A m k x) = nil

```  
intros m k x z t H1 H2.
split.
- intros [H3 H4].
  apply MF.expo_fexpf with (m:=m) in H3.
  apply expfo_expf.
  exact H1.
  exact H2.
  exact H3.
- intros H3.
  apply MF.expf_fexpo with (m:=m) in H3.
  apply expfo_expf.
  exact H1.
  exact H2.
  exact H3.
Qed.
```

original: intros m k x z t H1 H2. split. - intros [H3 H4]. apply MF.expo_fexpf with (m:=m) in H3. apply expfo_expf. apply H1. apply H2. apply H3. - intros H3. apply MF.expf_fexpo with (m:=m) in H3. apply expfo_expf. apply H1. apply H2. apply H3.
